title: Kadhal Anukkal Lyrics Enthiran
stanzas:
kaadhal anukkal udambil ethanai
neutron electron un neelak
kannil motham ethanai

sana sana ore vinaa ..?
azhagin motham neeyaa ..?

nee newton newton-in vidhiya ?
undhan nesam nesam
edhir vinaiyaa ..?
nee aayiram vinmeen
thirattiya punnagaiyaa ..?
azhagin motham neeya ..?

nee muttrum ariviyal piththan
aanaal mutham ketpathil jiththan
unnaal dheem thom thom
dheem thom thom
dheem thom thom
manadhil saththam

thaen thaen idhazhil yuththam
rojap poovil raththam
oh ..dheem thom thom
manadhil saththam

ho baby oh baby
senthenil vassaabi
ho baby ho baby
megathil pooththa gulaabi (2)

pattampoochi pattam poochi
kalgalai konduthaan rusi ariyum
kaadhal kollum manithap poochi
kangalai kondu thaan rusiy ariyum

odugira thanniyil thanniyil
oxygen miga adhigam
paadugira manasukkul manasukkul
aasaigal miga adhigam

aasaiye va vaa
aayiram kaadhalai
aindhe nodiyil seivom
penne vaa vaa vaa

kaadhal kaaraa
nesam valarkka
oru neram odhukku
endhan nenjam
veengi vittathey

kaadhalkaari ..
undhan idaiyaip pola
endhan pizhaippil kooda
kaadhalin neramum
ilaiththu vittathe

ho baby ho baby
senthenil vassaabi
ho baby ho baby
megathil pootha gulaabi (2)

kaadhal anukkal udambil ethanai
neutron electron un neelak
kannil motham ethanai

sana sana ore vinaa ..?
azhagin motham neeyaa ..?

nee newton newton-in vidhiya ?
undhan nesam nesam
edhir vinaiyaa ..?
nee aayiram vinmeen
thirattiya punnagaiyaa ..?
azhagin motham neeya ..?

ho baby ho baby
senthenil vassaabi
ho baby ho baby
megathil pootha gulaabi (2)

seo.title: Kadhal Anukkal Lyrics Enthiran
seo.description: Get the complete Kadhal Anukkal Lyrics Enthiran from Endhiran. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Shreya Goshal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Endhiran, AR Rahman, Shreya Goshal, Vijay Prakash, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
